scripts.dev: watchexec -w src -w df12_pages -w config -w pyproject.toml --exts css,py,yml,toml -- bun run build
scripts.build: bun run build:css && bun run build:images && bun run build:pages
scripts.build:pages: uv run pages bump && uv run pages generate
scripts.serve: bun run build && bunx http-server public -p 8080
